message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm counteroffering at $180. What do you think?
I'm getting close to the point where I'll have to consider buying from John, but I'm still interested in the product. Can you meet me at $160?

I understand you're getting close to considering John, but I think you'll really love this product. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $170. This is my final offer, but I think it's a great deal for both of us!
I appreciate the concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $155?
